name: Anveen Sandhu
comment: Very good food. Cooking Indian food at home is a smelly affair. It takes hours to take the smell out from your house. I am very thankful to Panjab tiffin service.

name: Ajitpal Singh
comment: Best tiffin services in town, I ordered once and will certainly order again in future. Very friendly customer service, food same like home as expected.

name: Karanbir Singh
comment: Absolutely delicious food and service. They followed the instructions. I had a very good experience with their food menu and their excellent service.

name: Shaanbir Singh
comment: I like the variety of food in their services specially the on time delivery is excellent. I really like their advance delivery system.
